gameobject

Class Creature

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameobject.GameObject
      • gameobject.Creature
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DynamicObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, Player

    public abstract class Creature
extends GameObject
implements DynamicObject
    This is the class that manages all the characters that are in the game!
    Author:
    kaie & kabir
